title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H1 - Oct 15 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H1 - Oct 15 2022
description:
The Democrats soft-on-crime policies should be everyone's number-one issue at the ballot box. Buck says, "We need a whole different mentality than what libs have brought to the table on crime. Top to bottom." Mexican cartels will make $13 billion illegally smuggling people into the United States this year. Putting that number into perspective Clay noted that’s more than the NFL, MLB or NBA made last season. How can the U.S. spend billions securing Ukraine’s border, but not its own? A 32-year-old illegal alien stabbed eight people, killing two on Las Vegas Strip. Crime, illegal immigration and economy are the three things Republicans need to focus on. But what's possible they might make their big issue instead? Clay says, "Ukraine has become the new new thing for left-wingers. That's what they're obsessed with. That's what they're focused on."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
